snippet: Artek went to unusual lengths on Saturday to present “Mozartean Masterpieces” in a manner inspired by accounts from Mozart’s day.
abstract: Steve Smith reviews concert of Mozart works performed by early-music ensemble Artek at Immanuel Lutheran Church.
lead_paragraph: Artek went to unusual lengths on Saturday to present “Mozartean Masterpieces” in a manner inspired by accounts from Mozart’s day.

headline.seo: Artek, an Early-Music Orchestra, at Immanuel Lutheran Church
headline.main: Recreating Fragile Sounds With an 18th-Century Configuration
headline.print_headline: Recreating Fragile Sounds With an 18th-Century Configuration
